fields.name: Subheadline
fields.default: Everything you need to know about our product and how it works.

default.question: How does the free trial work?
default.answer: Start your 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.

default.question: Can I change my plan later?
default.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your account settings.

default.question: What payment methods do you accept?
default.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for annual plans.

default.question: Is there a setup fee?
default.answer: No, there are no setup fees or hidden costs. You only pay for your subscription.
